SA11sanss18u:321_0: tena ratiṃkara raśmi nivṛttā //puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:322_0: dānu dadanti vicitram anekaṃ prārthayamānu anuttaru bodhiṃ /
SA11sanss18u:322_1: /āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:323_0: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:323_1: /jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:324_0: eka tu dharma mukhātu anekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena //
SA11sanss18u:326_0: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī /
SA11sanss18u:328_0: dharmapadârthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:328_1: / prajñapradīpayâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:331_0: dharmâsvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:331_1: /dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:333_0: dharmânugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:334_0: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:337_0: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:337_1: /niṣparidāha yâusari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:338_0: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ //
SA11sanss18u:340_0: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān /
SA11sanss18u:341_0: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:343_0: kṣāntiviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya yâkṣama codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:344_0: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:345_0: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā /
SA11sanss18u:345_1: /raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:346_0: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:347_0: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitvâkhinnaprayogāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:348_0: te catu mārapathâtikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti anuttara bodhiṃ //
SA11sanss18u:349_0: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
SA11sanss18u:350_0: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tenôtaptavatī prabha labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:350_1: /śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:351_0: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:351_2: varṇita dhyāna praśāntâraṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:351_3: /prajñaviyūha yâusari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:352_0: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye 'smin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:357_0: karā jina bhonti //rājyadhanâtmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:358_0: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:358_1: /buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:360_0: buddhabalâviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:362_0: ye 'bhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:363_0: trāyita yaccharaṇâgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:365_0: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:367_0: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacoditâyu kṣayānte /
SA11sanss18u:368_0: buddhânusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ /
SA11sanss18u:371_0: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇânte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:371_1: /dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:372_0: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:373_0: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:374_0: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti /
SA11sanss18u:375_1: /te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:376_0: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:377_1: /raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:382_0: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:382_1: /ratnaviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:383_0: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
SA11sanss18u:384_0: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:385_0: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:385_1: /gandhaprabhāsa yâusari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:386_0: ghrātvâmānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti /
SA11sanss18u:389_1: /raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalôpama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:390_0: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:390_1: /muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:394_0: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagnâcela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:397_0: raśmi rasâgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasâgra labhantī /
SA11sanss18u:398_0: bhojana pāna vicitra rasâgrān datva rasâgravatī prabha labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:399_1: /cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
SA11sanss18u:400_0: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:402_0: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:403_0: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇôdīrita raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:404_0: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //citta-
SA11sanss18u:406_0: viśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
SA11sanss18u:407_0: citta samādhivaśânuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:409_0: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabdâśabdata śūnya vijānī /
SA11sanss18u:410_0: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā /
SA11sanss18u:410_1: /gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
SA11sanss18u:413_0: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasâgrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:414_1: /sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:415_0: śaktitriśūlâsi [[DOUBT]] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumôtpala bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:415_1: /duṣyâneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:417_1: /dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
SA11sanss18u:419_0: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā /
SA11sanss18u:421_0: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:421_1: /yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
SA11sanss18u:422_0: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇâiṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:422_1: /teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:423_0: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhôpacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:423_1: /ye ca śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:424_0: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:426_0: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī nô ca sa nâsti udeti sa loke /
SA11sanss18u:430_0: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanss18u:432_0: te pi tu asti mahâtmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:432_1: /evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanss18u:433_1: /yasy imu [[DOUBT]] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [[DOUBT]] prasādaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:434_0: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nâṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ /
SA11sanss18u:437_0: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī /
SA11sanss18u:437_1: /ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpa-dita buddhaguṇeṣu /
SA11sanss18u:438_0: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarvôdikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:443_0: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:450_0: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
SA11sanss18u:451_0: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:452_0: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramâṇurajātaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:458_0: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:460_0: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahâtmā //
SA11sanss18u:461_0: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
SA11sanss18u:462_0: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganânusmṛtîmān /
SA11sanss18u:463_0: kalpâcintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum /
SA11sanss18u:464_1: /te ca vaśe sthitâṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvakâika bhavībahu bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:465_0: bhūtva bahuḥ punâika bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin /
SA11sanss18u:465_1: /te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi anarthiku lokôpekṣī /
SA11sanss18u:466_0: darśayi kāyavikurvâcintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitâiṣī /
SA11sanss18u:466_1: /candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:471_0: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:473_0: teṣu svarâṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena /
SA11sanss18u:473_1: /sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
SA11sanss18u:474_0: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam /
SA11sanss18u:475_1: /māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:476_0: dhyānâbhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:476_1: /rāhu yathêṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:477_0: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:477_1: /so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayîdṛśa ṛddhī /
SA11sanss18u:478_0: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā /
SA11sanss18u:479_0: yātuka bimbaranekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
SA11sanss18u:481_1: .. purato gata svâyum /eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurêndrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:481_2: /netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:482_0: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurêndrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:483_0: sarvajagasyâśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī // ...
SA11sanss18u:484_0: vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
SA11sanss18u:485_0: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhâvaha sarvajagasya //
SA11sanss18u:486_0: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
SA11sanss18u:487_0: darśayi lokavipākâcintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
